thread.title: Miley Cyrus shows some love for Olympic skier Gus Kenworthy
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus shows some love for Olympic skier Gus Kenworthy

title: Miley Cyrus shows some love for Olympic skier Gus Kenworthy
text:
Singer Miley Cyrus attends the 13th Annual LA County Walk To Defeat ALS at Exposition Park on October 18, 2015 in Los Angeles. (Photo: Frazer Harrison, Getty Images)
1 CONNECT 11 After winning his silver medal at the Sochi Olympics, freeskier Gus Kenworthy was asked who he'd choose as a celebrity crush.
On Thursday, his celeb crush, Miley Cyrus, showed him some love on Instagram.
"Never have I ever been prouder to call @guskenworthy my friend!," she wrote. "He is showing all of us what it means to be courageous and PROUD of who we are! You have won so much more than any medal .... You have won FREEDOM!
"You are making it possible to shine light on the LGBTQ community in front of a whole new world! So much respect for you ... I l ve l ve l ve you!"
Never have I ever been prouder to call @guskenworthy my friend! ( and he's a bad ass fucking Olympic athlete) He is showing all of us what it means to be courageous and PROUD of who we are! You have won so much more than any medal .... You have won FREEDOM! I can't wait to see what you and I can do with @happyhippiefdn together! You are making it possible to shine light on the LGBTQ community in front of a whole new world! So much respect for you ‚ù§Ô∏è I l ve l ve l ve you! Ug heart is fluttering, feels like a million little cocoons just busted open and I am filled up with butterflies üå∑üå∫üå∏
A photo posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Oct 22, 2015 at 11:23am PDT
